member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_VARIABLE_DESC.Name
member.summary: A string that contains the variable name.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_VARIABLE_DESC.Semantic
member.summary: The semantic attached to the variable; otherwise NULL.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_VARIABLE_DESC.BufferOffset
member.summary: The offset between the beginning of the constant buffer and this variable; otherwise 0.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_VARIABLE_DESC.ExplicitBindPoint
member.summary: The register that this variable is bound to. To bind a variable explicitly use the D3D10_EFFECT_VARIABLE_EXPLICIT_BIND_POINT flag.
